sentence.Network_en: Estonia has done much to cultivate the friendship of western European countries.
sentence.Network_cn: 爱沙尼亚努力发展与西欧国家的友谊。

sentence.Network_en: Estonia said it too planned to hold a referendum on independence.
sentence.Network_cn: 爱沙尼亚称其也计划就独立问题进行全民公决。

sentence.Network_en: Estonia is switching to a market economy.
sentence.Network_cn: 爱沙尼亚正在向市场经济转轨。

list.abs: 用英语表示各个国家和地区急…… ... 爱沙尼亚 Estonia EE 爱沙尼亚共和国 Republic of Estonia 安道尔 Andorra AD.

means.word_mean: 1. a republic in northeastern Europe on the Baltic Sea
